name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Snake Game version 10.0, season 2: christmas wonderland

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a funny snake game for your desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎉 Welcome to the Ultimate Snake Experience! 🐍
✨ Chrome Snake Game - Version 10.0 ✨
🎮 Play the classic Snake game directly from your browser with exciting new updates! 🚀



🌟 Season 2: Christmas wonderland is here!!!
All I want for christmassss issssssss A NEW UPDATE
Get ready to go and play in the snow...........
Help the snake to grap as many as gifts and break your own record..

Some seasonal specials🛠️ 
📅 This season runs from 12 december - 20 januari.
🐍 The snake now looks like the Santa Claus🎅
🍎The apples become gifts???
🎅 I am going to change the game icon as soon as possible.
🎵 The music has been set to christmas vibes.(thanks to Mariah Carey)









Some 🐛 at the moment⬇️⬇️. 
Next bug fix update=16-18 december.

- The bug that you die randomly if a very hard bug to fix. I am working on it!!

- There is also a bug that if you start the game you can't control the snake.

📖 How to Play?
1️⃣ Download the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2️⃣ No permissions required! Quick and simple. ✅
3️⃣ Use the arrow keys ⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️ to control the snake and collect as many 🍎 as possible.
💡 Pro Tip: Avoid the walls and your own tail, or it’s Game Over! 😱



🔜 What’s Coming in the Next Update?
👀 Get ready for Season 3, packed with new challenges, features, and endless fun! 🎉
🚀 Download now and enjoy Snake like never before!
